cqs: How many relations are described between c1 and exactly 1 thing?
How many things may c1 do with exactly 1 thing?
How many things could c1 do with exactly 1 thing?
How many things can c1 do with exactly 1 thing?
How many relations exist between c1 and exactly 1 thing?
How many relations are there between c1 and exactly 1 thing?
How many relations are available between c1 and exactly 1 thing?
How many relations are proposed between c1 and exactly 1 thing?
query: SELECT (COUNT(?x) AS ?cnt) WHERE { <c1> rdfs:subClassOf [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty ?x ; owl:onClass [ owl:unionOf rdf:nil ] ; owl:qualifiedCardinality "1"^^xsd:nonNegativeInteger ] . }
